

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Probability

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Probabilities are represented by numbers between 0 (impossible) and 1
(completely certain). Probabilities are abbreviated using the
lower-case letter *p* The value *p*=0.5 means a 50/50 chance; the
value *p*=0.25 means a 1-in-4 chance; the value *p*=0.999999... means
almost certainly; the value *p*=0.000000...1 means very rarely.
